name: Hay Day Pop
summary:
Welcome to Hay Day Pop, the latest puzzle game from the creators of Hay Day!

POP through puzzles, harvest crops and build the farm of your dreams!

Solve puzzles, complete farm tasks, and breathe new life into the land. But building your dream farm won’t be that easy! Puff, Inc.’s industrial operation has clogged the sky with smog.

Clear up the smog to expand your farm, find lush land for crops, and discover more buildings to restore. The more smog you clear, the more chances you’ll get to unlock new decorations and animals!

Solve puzzles to get farm energy! Match two or more puzzle pieces to form explosive boosters and create clever combos. The bigger the match, the better the boost! Every puzzle you complete gets you a step closer to building your dream farm.

Use your farm energy to harvest crops and sell them to visitors to earn coins! Use coins to uncover new areas and upgrade your farm. Level up to unlock endless possibilities to repair, design and customize your slice of paradise!

Populate your farm with cute cows, buzzing bumblebees, plump piggies and more!

While you’re not hard at work on the farm, meet your neighbours and make new friends! Join a neighbourhood and complete deliveries with your friends to reap even bigger rewards. See who has the best farm around!

Every month brings a new season and with each new season comes fresh puzzles popping fun! New game pieces, levels and decorations are just around the corner.

Legend-dairy puzzles and farming await in Hay Day Pop!
